abstract: Islamic State militants carry out surprise attack on Iraqi Kurdish fighters near Kirkuk, killing Kurdish commander and five soldiers; attack on strategic city is one of Islamic State's most aggressive.
lead_paragraph: The assault was repelled but it underscored the ability of the Islamic State to strike at Iraq’s cities, despite the American-backed campaign to dislodge the group.
snippet: The assault was repelled but it underscored the ability of the Islamic State to strike at Iraq’s cities, despite the American-backed campaign to dislodge the group.

keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
keywords.name: organizations

headline.main: Islamic Militants Surprise Kurds in Iraq, Killing a Commander in a Day of Attacks
headline.print_headline: Islamic Militants Surprise Kurds in Iraq, Killing a Commander in a Day of Attacks
